title: Best Draft Classes Plus Grading the Quarterbacks
description:
Kevin, Kaelen, and Steven discuss Day 3 of the 2022 NFL Draft and debate which teams made the best additions to their rosters.
Hosts: Kevin Clark, Kaelen Jones, and Steven Ruiz
Producer: Chris Sutton
Production Assistance: Arjuna Ramgopal
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
